==== server.d.ts (0 errors) ====
    declare module "other" {
        export class C { }
    }
    
    declare module "server" {
        import events = require("other"); // Ambient declaration, no error expected.

            export var a: number;
        }
    
        export = S; // Ambient declaration, no error expected.
